name: Boitatá
description:
Boitatá: Protector of the Forest" is an exciting action game where you take on the role of the legendary Brazilian creature, Boitatá. Your mission is to protect the forest from the enemies that are trying to destroy it.

Using Boitatá's powers, you will be able to use your Fire powers and also create watchful eyes that will attack forest enemies!

Throughout the game, you'll find different species of animals that need your help.

With retro-style graphics and sound effects, "Boitatá: Protector of the Forest" is a game that will capture your attention and show the importance of environmental preservation. Come and become the protector of the forest and save Brazilian nature!
